title: Potent anti-coronaviral activity of pateamines and new insights into their mode of action
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Francesca Magari, Henri Messner, Florian Salisch, Stella M. Schmelzle, Ger van Zandbergen, Alois Fürstner, John Ziebuhr, Andreas Heine, Christin Müller-Ruttloff, Arnold Grünweller
